name: Idle Hitman
description:
Click the blood to get money this will allow u to buy upgrades. Get good and when you are at 50,000 kills, 500 multipliers and 500 auto killers you can prestige. This will reset you but give you the new ability to destroy a city for $10,000. Have fun!
